text:
"Marriage Story" is a 2019 drama movie written and directed by Noah Baumbach. It stars Scarlett Johansson and Adam Driver, with Laura Dern, Alan Alda, Ray Liotta, Julie Hagerty, and Merritt Wever in supporting roles.
The movie follows a married couple, an actress and a stage director (Johansson and Driver), going through a coast-to-coast divorce.
